input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN borderColor = 'borderless' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(id) * 100 AS percentage, SUM(CASE WHEN borderColor = 'borderless' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS borderless_count, COUNT(id) AS total_count FROM cards;"
